column1: Little Goat Diner////I was so ready to give this place 5 stars but sadly
column2: I think this place is all hype. Â The service is ok at best. The food leaves much to be desired and is hit or miss. I understand it's a goat theme
column3: but some combinations in this restaurant just didn't work. It seemed like some of the dishes were just thrown together just for the sake of being creative
